list_definition.definition: to obtain (a victory) in a contest; to succeed in coming first in (a contest), usually by one’s own efforts

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He won a convincing victory in the election
He won (the race) in a fast time / by a clear five metres.

list_definition.definition: to obtain (a prize) in a competition etc, usually by luck

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I won $5 in the crossword competition.

list_definition.definition: to obtain by one’s own efforts

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He won her respect over a number of years.
She’s had two wins in four races.
